file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: "Profiling Assistant is responsible for triggering profilings if available."
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Profiling Assistant API
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:3011
tags:
  - name: profiling
    description: Profiling requests

paths:
  /profiling/exists:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "#/components/parameters/divaHeader"
    post:
      tags:
        - profiling
      summary: Check if profiling workflow exists for given entity.
      operationId: profilingExists
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                entityId:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/EntityId"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Exist result
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string   
        "404":
          description: not found error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                oneOf:
                 - $ref: "#/components/responses/DAGNotFoundError"
                 - $ref: "#/components/responses/EntityNotFoundError"
        "4XX":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UnexpectedError"
        "5XX":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UnexpectedError"

  /profiling/run:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "#/components/parameters/divaHeader"
    post:
      tags:
        - profiling
      summary: Trigger profiling workflow for an entity.
      operationId: profilingRun
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                entityId:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/EntityId"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Triggered profiling
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object   
        "404":
          description: not found error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                oneOf:
                 - $ref: "#/components/responses/DAGNotFoundError"
                 - $ref: "#/components/responses/EntityNotFoundError"
        "4XX":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UnexpectedError"
        "5XX":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UnexpectedError"

  /profiling/run/{dag}:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "#/components/parameters/divaHeader"
    post:
      tags:
        - profiling
      summary: Trigger specific profiling workflow for an entity.
      operationId: profilingRunDag
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Triggered profiling
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object   
        "404":
          description: not found error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                oneOf:
                 - $ref: "#/components/responses/DAGNotFoundError"
                 - $ref: "#/components/responses/EntityNotFoundError"
        "4XX":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UnexpectedError"
        "5XX":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/UnexpectedError"

components:

  schemas:

    EntityId:
      title: Entity ID
      description: Unique identifier of an entity
      type: string
      example: "resource:uuid:asdsad4d1fcb08-b894-4bdf-b662-0f105d597189"
      pattern: "^.+:uuid:[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[089ab][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$"

    Error:
      type: object
      title: Operation error
      description: Error that can occure on request processing
      required:
        - type
        - message
        - code
      properties:
        type:
          title: Error type
          description: Futher error type information
          type: string
        message:
          title: Error message
          description: Details about error
          type: string
        code:
          title: Error code
          description: HTTP error code
          type: number
          format: int32
          example: 409
        errors:
          title: Errors
          description: More error details that are reference in most case specification or schema validation errors
          type: array
          items:
            type: object

  responses:
    Success:
      description: Successful
    DAGNotFoundError:
      description: DAG for Resource does not exist
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    EntityNotFoundError:
      description: Entity does not exist
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"          
    UnexpectedError:
      description: Internal error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    InvalidDataError:
      description: Invalid data supplied
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    
  parameters:
    divaHeader:
      in: header
      description: The system specific stringified object whit relevant data like actorId, token etc.
      name: x-diva
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/profiling/run/{dag}": post: operation "profilingRunDag": at 1:3541: parse path "/profiling/run/{dag}": path parameter not specified: "dag"
